abstract: Fox’s Wednesday night combination of “American Idol” and “The Moment of Truth” lifted the network far ahead of its rivals in the night’s ratings. According to Nielsen’s estimates, “American Idol” at 8 p.m. drew the largest audience of the night, 26 million viewers, while 16.9 million tuned in at 9 for “The Moment of Truth.”
lead_paragraph: Fox’s Wednesday night combination of “American Idol” and “The Moment of Truth” lifted the network far ahead of its rivals in the night’s ratings. According to Nielsen’s estimates, “American Idol” at 8 p.m. drew the largest audience of the night, 26 million viewers, while 16.9 million tuned in at 9 for “The Moment of Truth.”

headline.main: Ratings: ‘Idol Truth’? ‘The American Moment’? Whatever. Fox Wins Again.
